column4: Among the best known ichthyosaur genera, was smaller than most of its relatives, measuring {{convert|2|m|ftin|abbr=on}} in length.
The first Ichthyosaur, T.platyodon discovered by Mary Anning from the Blue Lias at Lyme Regis. Species of Temnodontosaurus were large, exceeding {{convert|12|m|ft|abbr=off|sp=us}} in length.
